mentions.tacticalSituation: Please give Paul Elgood your 1st vote in this election to ensure a strong local voice for Hove and Portslade stays in the City Council.

leaflet.personalStatement: Paul promises to be strong campaigner for local residents and issues in the City Council. He will never give up fighting for what is best for our city.

images.caption: Paul Elgood - A strong local voice for Hove and Portslade

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions that 'Paul has the skill and the tenacity to win for us again', which could be indicative of his prior experience and previous electoral success.
